attributes.review: this app is truly terrible. people kept telling me how much this app would make it to the top so i had to try it out, you know? so as i was downloading this app, i heard this noise outside my window in which i looked out. i saw this huge man standing there with his face to my window. i then jumped back and fell into the huge hole in my room. he then took all my bras and destroyed my room. i am writing this stuck in the hole. no one should get this app it is truly a disgrace.
